thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Full of character
thread.title_full: Full of character - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: maryWelshpool
title: Full of character
text:
A special hotel but would not advise anyone to stay in the room 450 area . A very large noisy generator just a few feet from the bedroom window , made sleep very difficult at night . A hospitality tray enabling us to make a cup of tea or coffee , would have been a very welcome addition in the room . Very helpful staff
Room Tip: avoid staying near generator / A/C unit See more room tips
